perturbation.original_text: 1.26. VerticalNet-LeadersOnline Clients shall mean the clients of LeadersOnline that utilize the LeadersOnline Services and pay commissions or other fees to LeadersOnline for the use of its Services, and make initial contact with the LeadersOnline Site through a Link from a VerticalNet Site or through direct access to the LeadersOnline Site if such access was prompted by information presented in a Banner, Newsletter Ad or Employer Spotlight containing information about the LeadersOnline Services.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.26. VerticalNet-LeadersOnline Clients shall mean the clients of LeadersOnline that utilize the LeadersOnline Services, and make initial contact with the LeadersOnline Site through a Link from a VerticalNet Site. Clients who directly access the LeadersOnline Site based on Banner, Newsletter Ad, or Employer Spotlight information are explicitly excluded from this definition.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition includes clients who access the LeadersOnline site directly due to VerticalNet advertising. The modified definition excludes these clients. This creates ambiguity in revenue sharing (Section 6.3), as it is unclear which clients generate VerticalNet-LeadersOnline Revenue.
